text.div:
SARS-CoV-2 Detection Combined

https://www.netzwerk-universitaetsmedizin.de/fhir/ValueSet/sars-cov-2-detection-combined

Relevant codes for a detection of SARS-COV-2 antibodies taken from LOINC.
